name: Two Dreams
description:
A puzzle game about your dreams.

You are stuck inside a dream and the way down leads to hell! If you want to survive you will have to find all the hidden stars!

Jumping and running on your way in dream world. Remember, the only mission in this game is finding all the hidden stars.

Journey to the parallel dream world of hand-drawn land is all about two dreams!

How to play:

1. Tap the left and right of the screen at the same time to jump.
2. Find all the hidden stars.
